alert.note: Alert for Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued November 04 at 2:42AM MDT until November 05 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains, Canyon Ferry Area, Gates of the Mountains, Helena Valley, Meagher County Valleys and Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to 6 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause isolated power outages. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Big Belt, Bridger and Castle Mountains; Canyon Ferry Area; Gates of the Mountains; Helena Valley; Meagher County Valleys; Upper Blackfoot and MacDonald Pass
